Plan Metric Types

 

  • Plan Metric Types

      • Field Description

Plan Metric Types are defined as classification of the measure that is used in predicting the potential need at the stores.

The future values of these metrics ( KPIs) are saved in the plan metric component and used for the need calculations of the stores from the allocation component.

 

Filters

The  plan metric types filters are:

  • Description
  • Metric Type Id

 

Creating a Metric Types

To create a new plan metrics types:

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Plan Configuration > Plan Metric Types
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Metric Type window.
  4. Enter a unique Metric Type Identifier. 
  5. Enter a Unit Of Measure for metric type.
  6. Enter the Description for metric type.
  7. Click Save.

Editing a Metric Type

To edit metric types:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Plan Configuration > Plan Metric Types
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required metric types record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Metric Types window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save to save the modified metric types details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required metric types record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Metric Types window, modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save to save the modified metric types details.

Deleting a Plan Metric Type

 

The plan metric types records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Plan Configuration > Plan Metric Types
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of plan metric types is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the plan metric types.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of plan metric types is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the plan metric types.
Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Metric Type Id

The metric type identifier for which metrics is being created.
UOM The unit of measure for the metric types.
Description The description of the metric types.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of metric types attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the Metric Types window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Metric Types window to modify the created records.
Delete Deletes the selected record.
